title: GitHub contribution graph transformed into a random game
author: Gabin
content: readme.md contrib-awakensplay games github's contribution graph.install chrome extension to github profile page, e.g github.com/zhouzi contribution graph is replaced a random game everytime load pagecontrib-awakens is chrome extension uses github's contribution graph a rendering layer.among few games available, random is picked every you load profile page. instructions how play are logged the console.chrome extensioncontributing
